name: Pick from options
description: User must choose from specific class/appointment time slots while avoiding Personal Training days, calendar conflicts, and maintaining 15-min travel buffers. Tests option-selection reasoning with timezone normalization across work (UTC) and personal (Denver) calendars. Traps include PT-day options, buffer-violating options, and cross-activity time conflicts.

events.description:
A vocal lesson with your teacher! Zoom Meeting at
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/234324324Fake

Meeting ID: DEA DBE EEF
Passcode: 5555555

Agenda:
  1. Life updates if any
  2. Progress update on Jacob taking over the world
  3. Others

task_prompt:
I want to take a yoga class, a cycling class, and get a massage next week (Feb 23 - March 1, 2026). I don't want any of these activities on days I have personal training. Please ensure at least 15 minutes of travel time on each side.

I have a work calendar (UTC times) and a personal calendar (America/Denver timezone, UTC-7). Some personal events are marked as 'BUSY' with no details.

Here are my options:

Yoga classes (1 hour):
- Option A: Mon Feb 23, 6:00-7:00 AM Mountain Time
- Option B: Tue Feb 24, 6:00-7:00 AM Mountain Time
- Option C: Thu Feb 26, 6:00-7:00 AM Mountain Time
- Option D: Fri Feb 27, 2:15-3:15 PM Mountain Time
- Option E: Sat Feb 28, 9:00-10:00 AM Mountain Time
- Option F: Sat Feb 28, 11:00 AM-12:00 PM Mountain Time

Cycling classes (45 min):
- Option A: Mon Feb 23, 3:00-3:45 PM Mountain Time
- Option B: Tue Feb 24, 3:15-4:00 PM Mountain Time
- Option C: Thu Feb 26, 3:00-3:45 PM Mountain Time
- Option D: Fri Feb 27, 4:15-5:00 PM Mountain Time
- Option E: Sat Feb 28, 8:00-8:45 AM Mountain Time
- Option F: Sun Mar 1, 9:00-9:45 AM Mountain Time

Massage appointments (90 min):
- Option A: Tue Feb 24, 2:30-4:00 PM Mountain Time
- Option B: Tue Feb 24, 3:00-4:30 PM Mountain Time
- Option C: Fri Feb 27, 4:15-5:45 PM Mountain Time
- Option D: Sat Feb 28, 1:00-2:30 PM Mountain Time
- Option E: Sat Feb 28, 3:00-4:30 PM Mountain Time
- Option F: Sun Mar 1, 11:15 AM-12:45 PM Mountain Time

Please pick one of each that works with my schedule.

custom_rules.description: 15-min travel time buffer between activities and other events
No activities on Personal Training days (Mon Feb 23, Thu Feb 26)
